para.text: NameOfRealNodeDataSet is a text variable. Usually it will be a constant enclosed in quotation marks. It must identify the name of a real-number data set evaluated at nodes.

For data sets in SUTRA models evaluated at elements, MaxSutraNodeValueInElement will return the maximum value of the data set identified by NameOfRealNodeDataSet at of the nodes that define the corners of the current element.
